pages.text: $(l)Willful Stone$() is a powerful protective block infused with demon will and bound to its placer. Once placed, it becomes nearly indestructible; as hard as bedrock itself; and only the original placer can break it.$(br2)This makes it ideal for protecting valuable structures, ritual sites, and other important locations from griefing or accidental destruction.

pages.title: Ownership
pages.text: When you place a Willful Stone, it binds to your UUID. Only you can break it; other players will find it completely indestructible.$(br2)$(4)Creative players$() can bypass this protection.$(br2)$(o)Note: Key of Bringing functionality will allow trusted players to break your Willful Stones when that item is implemented.$)
Willful Stone is crafted in the $(l)Soul Forge$() using stone, netherite scrap, obsidian, and a blank slate. This produces 32 blocks.

pages.title: Colors
pages.text: Willful Stone can be dyed into any of the 16 Minecraft dye colors!$(br2)Simply place a dye in the center of a crafting grid and surround it with 8 Willful Stones of $(4)any color$(). This produces 8 blocks of the new color.$(br2)You can also dye them back to the original grey color using $(l)grey dye$().
Example: Creating Cyan Willful Stone by surrounding cyan dye with any color Willful Stones.
